Well, y'see, in the game at least one of the girls is engaged to a guy. It actually is an arranged marriage, but they actually do have feelings for each other, so... Also, another of the girls has a long-held crush for a certain guy, so there's that... Suffice it to say, this guy isn't the object of their respective affections in the game. I actually haven't played far enough in the game to have seen much of Aranea (I burned out on that damn Chocobo-Moogle event from a while back, and didn't even get all the stuff I wanted either T3T ) but I'm guessing she's in love with flying, if her surname is any indication. :p That clear things up any?

I'm not sure how to express my thoughts on this one... It's like, there's no doubt it's erotic, but it just doesn't do anything for me at all. I don't really like it, but I don't dislike it either; I don't love it, nor do I hate it. My opinion is neither positive or negative, but somehow, it isn't neutral either. The only feeling I get is that I should probably have SOME feeling either way, but... I dunno, y'know? It's just not there. o3o
